author: Reuters Editorial
title: Silver linings: China air improves after coronavirus lockdowns, but smog seen returning
description: Air and water quality in China and elsewhere have improved dramatically after coronavirus lockdowns cut traffic and forced polluting factories to close.
content:
SHANGHAI (Reuters) - Air and water quality in China and elsewhere have improved dramatically after coronavirus lockdowns cut traffic and forced polluting factories to close. 
But on the 50th annual Earth Day, an event intended to show support for protecting … [+3017 chars]
